title: NFL's most intimidating team? Does Rodgers deserve MVP? Lamar's return? Kenny Clark
itunes:title: NFL's most intimidating team? Does Rodgers deserve MVP? Lamar's return? Kenny Clark
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Tom Pelissero, and Super Bowl Champion Michael Robinson debate which NFL team is the most intimidating with the playoffs right around the corner. Then the crew discusses if Lamar Jackson's potential return will be enough to get the Baltimore Ravens into the playoffs; they also dive into how MVP voting works and if Aaron Rodgers deserves the award. They finish up sharing which players need a refresh to close out the regular-season and they're joined by Green Bay Packers, nose tackle, Kenny Clark, and he shares his thoughts on his pro bowl season and what's different about Aaron Rodgers this season.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
